articles.author: NICOLE WINFIELD Associated Press, SYLVIE CORBET Associated Press, TRISHA THOMAS Associated Press
articles.title: Pope Francis insists Europe doesn't have a migrant emergency and challenges countries to open ports - ABC News
articles.description: Pope Francis is challenging French President Emmanuel Macron and other European leaders to open their ports to people fleeing hardship and poverty
articles.content: MARSEILLE, France -- MARSEILLE, France (AP) Pope Francis challenged French President Emmanuel Macron and other European leaders to open their ports to people fleeing hardship and poverty, insisting S… [+7331 chars]
